Banner.title: Web Design Barcelona
Banner.name: Luciano Santillan
bullets: Without relying on an expensive agency.

Services.intro: As a web software developer, I help businesses and individuals create, optimize, and improve their online presence. Whether you need a brand-new website, better performance, or a more effective SEO strategy, I offer tailored solutions to achieve your goals.

devAndDesign.title: Web Development and Design
devAndDesign.description1: I create modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites that align with your vision and business needs. Whether it's a personal portfolio, a business website, or a full web application, I ensure functionality and aesthetics go hand in hand.
devAndDesign.cta: My Web Development and Design Service!

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description1: Having a great website is not enough: it needs to be found! I optimize websites to improve their search engine rankings, increase visibility, and attract more organic traffic. This includes:

performance.title: Web Performance Optimization
performance.description1: A slow website means lost customers. I improve loading speed and responsiveness by optimizing images, caching strategies, and other performance techniques to ensure a smooth user experience.

ecommerce.title: Online Stores (eCommerce)
ecommerce.description1: Want to sell online? I build secure, scalable, and easy-to-manage eCommerce stores. Whether with WooCommerce or custom solutions, I ensure a seamless shopping experience for your customers.

security.title: Website Security and Protection
security.description1: Keeping your website secure is essential. I implement best security practices to prevent attacks and unauthorized access, including:
bullets: Login attempt control to prevent brute force attacks.
Regular security updates to keep your site protected.
SSL and HTTPS configuration for secure data encryption.
